name: UI Smoke via Playwright MCP
description: Run minimal UI flow with Playwright MCP/Browserbase if available

args.prompt: Check latest Playwright MCP usage examples and best practices for Cursor integration. Return concise steps.

args.script:
const { chromium } = require('playwright');
(async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('http://localhost:3000'); await page.waitForSelector('body'); await browser.close(); })();
